forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 27F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with snow likely after midnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies with a mixture of rain and snow developing overnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. A shower or two in the afternoon - otherwise, mostly cloudy. High near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain mixing with and changing to snow showers late. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -1C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 32F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening then a few snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early changing to a few snow showers late. Low 31F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 49F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers will become more widely scattered later on. Low near -5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low 24F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.
